name: Streadata.io API Gallery - Time Series
description: This is a repository of time series APIs, self-contained as a Github repository, with HTML and YAML representations of the APIs and their surrounding operations.

apis.name: Knoema
apis.description: Knoema is the free to use public and open data platform for users with interests in statistics and data analysis, visual storytelling and making infographics and data-driven presentations

apis.name: Alpha Vantage
apis.description: Composed of a tight-knit community of researchers, engineers, and business professionals, Alpha Vantage Inc. is a leading provider of free APIs for realtime and historical data on stocks, physical currencies, and digital/crypto currencies. Our success is driven by rigorous research, cutting edge technology, and a disciplined focus on democratizing access to data.

apis.name: quasardb
apis.description: quasardb is a distributed time series database with support for server-side aggregations. It scales horizontally and vertically for virtually unlimited capabilities, making it a popular choice for low-latency and Big Data applications.
